verses.verse: Then I-yov <WH347> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
How long will ye vex <WH3013> <WH8686> my soul <WH5315>, and break <WH1792> <WH8762> me in pieces with words <WH4405> ?
These ten <WH6235> times <WH6471> have ye reproached <WH3637> <WH8686> me: ye are not ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> that ye make yourselves strange <WH1970> <WH8686> to me.
And be it indeed <WH551> that I have erred <WH7686> <WH8804>, mine error <WH4879> remaineth <WH3885> <WH8799> with myself.
If indeed <WH551> ye will magnify <WH1431> <WH8686> yourselves against me, and plead <WH3198> <WH8686> against me my reproach <WH2781>:
Know <WH3045> <WH8798> now <WH645> that 'Elohim <WH433> hath overthrown <WH5791> <WH8765> me, and hath compassed <WH5362> <WH8689> me with his net <WH4686>.
Behold, I cry out <WH6817> <WH8799> of wrong <WH2555>, but I am not heard <WH6030> <WH8735>: I cry aloud <WH7768> <WH8762>, but there is no judgment <WH4941>.
He hath fenced up <WH1443> <WH8804> my way <WH734> that I cannot pass <WH5674> <WH8799>, and he hath set <WH7760> <WH8799> darkness <WH2822> in my paths <WH5410>.
He hath stripped <WH6584> <WH8689> me of my glory <WH3519>, and taken <WH5493> <WH8686> the crown <WH5850> from my head <WH7218>.
He hath destroyed <WH5422> <WH8799> me on every side <WH5439>, and I am gone <WH3212> <WH8799>: and mine hope <WH8615> hath he removed <WH5265> <WH8686> like a tree <WH6086>.
He hath also kindled <WH2734> <WH8686> his wrath <WH639> against me, and he counteth <WH2803> <WH8799> me unto him as one of his enemies <WH6862>.
His troops <WH1416> come <WH935> <WH8799> together <WH3162>, and raise up <WH5549> <WH8799> their way <WH1870> against me, and encamp <WH2583> <WH8799> round about <WH5439> my tabernacle <WH168>.
He hath put <WH7368> my brethren <WH251> far <WH7368> <WH8689> from me, and mine acquaintance <WH3045> <WH8802> are verily estranged <WH2114> <WH8804> from me.
My kinsfolk <WH7138> have failed <WH2308> <WH8804>, and my familiar friends <WH3045> <WH8794> have forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> me.
They that dwell <WH1481> <WH8802> in mine house <WH1004>, and my maids <WH519>, count <WH2803> <WH8799> me for a stranger <WH2114> <WH8801>: I am an alien <WH5237> in their sight <WH5869>.
I called <WH7121> <WH8804> my servant <WH5650>, and he gave me no answer <WH6030> <WH8799>; I intreated <WH2603> <WH8691> him with <WH1119> my mouth <WH6310>.
My breath <WH7307> is strange <WH2114> <WH8804> to my wife <WH802>, though I intreated <WH2589> <WH8800> for the children's <WH1121> sake of mine own body <WH990>.
Yea, young children <WH5759> despised <WH3988> <WH8804> me; I arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and they spake <WH1696> <WH8762> against me.
All my inward <WH5475> friends <WH4962> abhorred <WH8581> <WH8765> me: and they whom I loved <WH157> <WH8804> are turned <WH2015> <WH8738> against me.
My bone <WH6106> cleaveth <WH1692> <WH8804> to my skin <WH5785> and to my flesh <WH1320>, and I am escaped <WH4422> <WH8691> with the skin <WH5785> of my teeth <WH8127>.
Have pity <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me, have pity <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me, O ye my friends <WH7453>; for the hand <WH3027> of 'Elohim <WH433> hath touched <WH5060> <WH8804> me.
Why do ye persecute <WH7291> <WH8799> me as 'Elohim <WH410>, and are not satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799> with my flesh <WH1320> ?
Oh that <WH5414> <WH8799> my words <WH4405> were now <WH645> written <WH3789> <WH8735> ! oh that <WH5414> <WH8799> they were printed <WH2710> <WH8714> in a book <WH5612> !
That they were graven <WH2672> <WH8735> with an iron <WH1270> pen <WH5842> and lead <WH5777> in the rock <WH6697> for ever <WH5703> !
For I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that my redeemer <WH1350> <WH8802> liveth <WH2416>, and that he shall stand <WH6965> <WH8799> at the latter <WH314> day upon the earth <WH6083>:
And though after <WH310> my skin <WH5785> worms destroy <WH5362> <WH8765> this body, yet in my flesh <WH1320> shall I see <WH2372> <WH8799> 'Elohim <WH433>:

Whom I shall see <WH2372> <WH8799> for myself, and mine eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> <WH8804>, and not another <WH2114> <WH8801>; though my reins <WH3629> be consumed <WH3615> <WH8804> within <WH2436> me.
But ye should say <WH559> <WH8799>, Why persecute <WH7291> <WH8799> we him, seeing the root <WH8328> of the matter <WH1697> is found <WH4672> <WH8738> in me?

Be ye afraid <WH1481> <WH8798> of the sword <WH2719>: for wrath <WH2534> bringeth the punishments <WH5771> of <WH6440> the sword <WH2719>, that ye may know <WH3045> <WH8799> there is a judgment <WH1779> <WH8675> <WH1779>.
